name: smakaphotography
description: Portfolio site for Samantha Maka Photography

scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin pricing.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pricing.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin schedule.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/schedule.html && usemin portfolio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
